item.title: Securing GenAI Workloads in Azure: A Complete Guide to Monitoring and Threat Protection - AIO11Y
item.description: Series Introduction Generative AI is transforming how organizations build applications, interact with customers, and unlock insights from data. But with this transformation comes a new security challenge: how do you monitor and protect AI workloads that operate fundamentally differently from traditional applications?
